alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Dubuque; Jackson (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 11:31PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Jo Daviess, southwestern Stephenson, northwestern Jackson, central Dubuque and northeastern Delaware Counties through 1215 AM CDT... At 1131 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Farley to Galena. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dubuque, Galena, Asbury, Bellevue, Epworth, East Dubuque, Peosta, Hanover, Elizabeth, Woodbine, Holy Cross, La Motte, Menominee, Luxemburg, Rickardsville, St. Donatus, Centralia, Sageville, Zwingle and Bankston. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in the Quad Cities.
